item.title: Contextual Active Model Selection
item.description: CAMS, a novel contextual active model selection algorithm, minimizes labeling costs by strategically selecting pre-trained models and querying labels for data points, achieving significant improvement…

item.title: Do LLMs dream of elephants (when told not to)? Latent concept association and associative memory in transformers
item.description: LLMs’ fact retrieval is easily manipulated by context, highlighting their associative memory behavior; this paper studies this with transformers, showing how self-attention and value matrices support …
